content: cozy autumn socks size gauge women s medium large 9 stitches to 1 materials needles one 100 gram skein sock yarn 2 25mm /us 1 circulars or dpns darning needle or needle size to get gauge stitch marker cuff heel turn cast on 60 72 stitches with right side facing with the german twisted row 1 k17 20 ssk k1 turn cast on row 2 slip 1 p5 p2tog p1 turn once you have completed your cast on join your stitches to knit in the row3 slip 1 knit to 1 stitch before round n1 will have 30 36 stitches gap ssk k1 turn and n2 will have 30 36 stitches row 4 slip 1 purl to 1 stitch before begin ribbing as follows the gap p2tog p1 turn medium size repeat row 3 &4 until all stitches have been worked 18 20 stitches left k2 p2 to end of round gusset large size knit across heel flap stitches 18 20 p1 k2 p2 to last stitch p1 you will now pick up 16 19 stitches repeating the stitches between the i pick up the stitches between the purl repeat ribbing until your preferred bumps and underneath 2 strings of length the sample was 10 rounds yarn one extra stitch is picked up at the corner of the heel flap just before once ribbing is completed begin chart you join to n1 this is to avoid a gap for your size repeat row 1-­ 12 as but you can choose to just pick up many times until desired leg length 15 18 stitches the sample was knit with 5 repeats for the leg rejoin with n1 and knit across the instep on n1 in chart pattern and then heel flap pick up your stitches 16 19 on the other side of the heel flap on n2 you will knit across n1 in pattern and starting on the rs of n2 the heel flap after you have picked up your stitches is knit on n2 only n1 stitches will be you are now back to the heel turn left on hold until heel flap & turn are stitches knit 9 10 this is the completed the first 3 and last 3 beginning of the round and you can stitches are always knit place a marker if you wish row 1 k3 slip 1 k1 to last 3 k3 gusset decreases are as follows row 2 k3 purl to last 3 k3 repeat these two row until you have 15 18 purl row on the edges of heel flap round 1 on n2 knit to the last 3 stitches k2tog k1 knit across n1 in pattern on n2 k1 ssk knit to middle of heel round 2 n2 is knit and n1 is knit in pattern repeat these two gusset decrease rounds until you have reached your original stitch count 60 72 stitches 30 36 stitches on n1 & n2 foot continue knitting the foot as follows abbreviations n1 is in pattern
